data.title: Marianna Airport
data.text:
Marianna Municipal Airport

Marianna Municipal Airport (KMAI) is a general aviation facility located five miles northeast of the city of Marianna, in Jackson County, Florida. It has two multi-directional runways including a newly resurfaced 6,001 feet runway (north/south) and an intersecting 4,900-foot-long runway (east/west). The vast ramp space at the airport has approximately 183,475 square yards of apron area and over 200 tie-downs for aircraft. The newly renovated terminal has a space dedicated for a pilot lounge, flight service station, weather briefing area, and pilot training classroom. There is also a large event space with a food preparation station, food bar, shuffleboard and pool table and enough space for all your friends and family.

A Rich History

Fuel

It would be hard to find an airport more convenient for refueling your plane. Our geographic location, brand new runway, large ramp, new self-serve stations and friendly staff make refueling easy. We take our refueling service very serious and we know you want to get back in the air quickly.

New self-fueling stations

Our staff will be glad to refuel your plane for you. But if you want to pump it yourself or refuel after hours, the Marianna Airport now offers new, state-of-the-art, ‘On-The-Fly’ self-fueling stations. The On-The-Fly self-fueling station can be easily accessed on our spacious ramp and is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Just like refueling your car–pull up, insert your credit card, fill up, fly away. What could be easier than that?

On-The-Fly Fuel Station Benefits:

Modern, state-of-the-art pumping stations

Available 24/7

Pull up. Fill up. Take off.

Convenient and safe

100 Low-Lead fuel

Jet Fuel

On-Site Maintenance

Marianna Airport is proud to have an aviation maintenance partner on site. Neville Aviation (NevAv) offers comprehensive maintenance services. From prop balances to inspections and high-end customizations/upgrades, we take care of your aircraft on the ground, so that it will take care of you in the air. NevAv also provides complete aircraft customizations/upgrades, rotary and fixed wing aircraft brokerage services for corporate and general aviation, flight instruction, and professional drone services. For more information visit www.nevilleaviation.com.

Propeller Maintenance

Marianna Airport is lucky to have a world-class propeller maintenance company in our own backyard. Air Prop Specialists services propellers from all over the world. Uncompromising in their dedication to quality and service support Air Prop Specialists supports its customers with cost-effective, fast-response component/system repair, unit exchange programs and worldwide logistics programs. A few of the services they offer include inspection/repair programs, phase maintenance, aircraft modifications, AOG support, and scheduled maintenance/overhaul support. They also offer the capacity of full-service MRO and on-site solutions for a full range of components for military aircraft users. See their full list of services at www.airprop.net.

Future Development

The future of the airport is bright. There is a proposed development plan that includes near-term and long-term development and improvement. The plan was well underway when the COVID pandemic put things on temporary hold. If you would like to see what the future holds for the Marianna Airport, give us a call. We love talking about our airport.
